Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 77th overall pick, by Detroit in 1984...
Released by Detroit on 3/2/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/6/1988 to a 2-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Injured on 4/11/1992 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...

Hit first career homerun on 4/19/1994, off Ken Hill (TEX)...
